txt.en: These are the notices to post around Lake-town
Notices can be posted in places all around Lake-town.\n\nYou should post notices around Lake-town.
The stack of notices is in the guards' barracks in Lake-town.\n\nYou should take the stack of notices.
You have agreed to do some chores for Captain Álarr in exchange for access to the murder location. Place notices around Lake-town for the guards.
'I need someone to go around town posting notices. That someone is now you! Take the stack from over there and put them up anywhere that looks appropriate.'
Captain Álarr can be found in the guards' barracks in Lake-town.\n\nYou should talk to Álarr.
'Yes, yes, I'm sure you did a wonderful job. What do you want, a pat on the head and a biscuit?'
